description: The replay source offers the possibility to replay values from an CSV file. The replay source creates an additional stream internally that publishes the JSON values of all streams at a certain time.

contents.name: RowValueMetadataId
contents.description: Override GUID for JSON row value stream.

contents.name: FileName
contents.description: The name of the CSV file to use (e.g. "Data/demo_data.csv").

contents.name: Frequency
contents.description: The interval (in milliseconds) to use for replaying values line by line in (e.g. 100)

contents.name: RestartAutomatically
contents.description: Restart replay from top after reaching end.

contents.name: Streams
contents.description: Link to all replay streams of this source.
